scripts.start-info: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && cargo build --lib --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && npx snowpack build && svelte-check && export RUST_LOG=info && cargo run
scripts.start-debug: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && cargo build --lib --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && npx snowpack build && svelte-check && export RUST_LOG=debug && cargo run
scripts.build: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi && cargo clippy --lib --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown -- -Dwarnings && cargo build --lib --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && npx snowpack build && svelte-check && cargo clippy --release -- -Dwarnings && cargo build --release
scripts.update-js-deps: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install
